instructions: Tap the Phone app to open it. Tap the Voicemail icon in the bottom right corner. If you still retain deleted messages that can be undeleted, you'll see Deleted Messages option. Tap it to bring up a list of all the voicemails you've removed that are still on your phone. Tap the voicemail you want to undelete. Tap Undelete beneath the selected voicemail. Tap the Voicemail menu in the top left corner to return to the main Visual Voicemail screen. The voicemail you just undeleted will be there waiting for you.

Tap the Phone app. Tap Voicemail . Tap Deleted Messages . Tap Clear All in the top right corner. Tap Clear All in the pop-up confirmation screen. Your Deleted Voicemails folder is now empty, and you can't recover anything that it contained.
